title: What is plasma membrane? - SCI&GS-HUB - Quora

response.answer_text: Each cell is surrounded by a cell membrane or a plasma membrane. The cell membrane has fine pores which allows the substances to enter or leave the cell . The cell membrane is composed of lipo protein. The permeability of the cell membrane is selective i.e it allows certain substancea to enter or leave the cell while it prevents others.
